metadata.synopsis: If players go away from the Blood Merchant's Lair and the dialog never triggers, this AD will be triggered instead.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Entering S_LOW_BloodMerchant_StartDialogue_0f4ca0ce-5695-434b-9dbb-3e3b911c6bea after receiving the potion (or drink-it) without talking with Araj.

0.speaker: Araj Oblodra
0.text: You're are coming back, aren't you? Imminently?
0.context: NodeContext: A hint of a threat
